news.title: Rare earth stocks surge on U.S-China trade dispute over the critical minerals
news.summary: President Donald Trump threatens China with a "massive" increase in tariffs. The move is in retaliation for Beijing imposing strict controls on rare earths.

news.title: Broadcom stock soars 10% on OpenAI custom chip deal, adding to Nvidia and AMD agreements
news.summary: OpenAI is teaming up with Broadcom to jointly develop and deploy 10 gigawatts of custom AI accelerators starting in 2026. OpenAI and Broadcom will jointly develop, deploy and test 10 gigawatt custom AI acceleration systems.

news.title: Bloom Energy soars more than 25% on deal with Brookfield to put fuel cells in AI data centers
news.summary: Bloom Energy and Brookfield Asset Management are developing power solutions for data center campuses. The agreement is the latest in a series of power deals between the two companies.

news.title: 'Long and painful nightmare' is over, Trump says, on historic day for the Middle East
news.summary: Trump arrived in Tel Aviv earlier Monday to mark the release of Israeli hostages by Hamas. The hostages had been held for more than two years in captivity.

news.title: JPMorgan Chase says it will invest $10 billion into industries critical for national security
news.summary: The move helps JPMorgan Chase organize its activities around national interests. The move comes at a time of heightened tensions between the U.S. and China.

news.title: These stocks are surging as JPMorgan follows Trump’s lead with investments in ‘critical’ industries
news.summary: JPMorgan launches $1.5 trillion initiative to boost industries deemed vital for national security. Trump administration took stakes in rare-earth, lithium and chip companies.

news.title: Deal mania is back on Wall Street. Here’s what it means for JPMorgan — and for banking-sector earnings.
news.summary: JPMorgan leads a parade of bank earnings on Tuesday, followed by Bank of America and Morgan Stanley on Wednesday. A rise in M&A and IPO activity during the quarter takes center stage.

news.title: ‘She’s been moving money from his account’: My late father wrote a will before meeting his current wife. Who gets his money?
news.summary: “He gave his fourth wife power of attorney and access to his bank account to pay bills,” the victim's lawyer says. “He’s a man who gave his wife a lot of power,’ the lawyer adds.

news.title: ‘We’re in a market bubble based on AI exuberance’: I’m moving my $200K IRA to a money-market account. Is that wise?
news.summary: “I will also draw Social Security when I reach 70, which will be $3,500 per month,” he says.

news.title: Is the stock market open today? Does the post office deliver mail on Columbus Day/Indigenous Peoples’ Day?
news.summary: Be prepared for plenty of closures on Monday. There will be a lot of traffic on the East Coast on Monday and Tuesday. It will also be busy on the West Coast on Tuesday.
